name: app-search
title: App Search
description: AI-powered application search - find installed apps by name, purpose, or description
author: tktcorporation

preferences.name: language
preferences.title: Language
preferences.description: Select your preferred language for the extension

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Apps
commands.description: Search for installed applications using AI-powered fuzzy matching

tools.name: search-installed-apps
tools.title: Search Installed Apps
tools.description: Search for installed applications by name, purpose, or category. Returns installed apps with optional suggestions for uninstalled apps.

ai.instructions: Help users find applications on their system. ALWAYS search installed applications first. Match based on app name, purpose, or category. Only suggest uninstalled apps if few matches found or explicitly requested. Indicate which apps are installed vs suggestions.

expected.meetsCriteria: Returns browser applications like Chrome or Safari

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
